bio: Hi, I'm Ville Pitkänen from Vaasa, Finland. I'm interested in computers and programming and currently studying computer science. I'm a calm and responsible person who learns fast and works well with others. When I'm not studying, I'm usually at the gym, gaming or coding. My GPA is 4.6 as of January 2024. I speak Finnish and English fluently, and I can get by in Swedish too. What I really like about programming is figuring out how to fix real-life problems and making things that people enjoy using. Mandatory military service I completed in 2019.

quickFacts.Name: Ville Pitkänen
quickFacts.Education: Bachelor of Engineering, Information Technology (2nd year)
quickFacts.Languages: Finnish, English, Swedish, (Duolingo Spanish), Java, C, TypeScript

skills.name: Programming
projects: My projects you can find on my GitHub (see Quick Info)

skills.name: Embedded systems
projects: I've completed courses on Embedded systems basics, Electronics and Digital technologies with good grades.
In my free time I have done projecs with my Arduino and Raspberry Pi.

workMerits.Vaasa City Library: 2023, 2022, 2020 | I was working a summer job in the Vaasa City Library. My tasks were mainly customer service, using the library database and shelving/organizing the books.
workMerits.Aksoastra Oy: 2018 | I worked a summer job in a wholesale company. Work tasks were packaging products, loading and some bookkeeping.
